In this position you will be part of our Governance, Risk & Compliance team (GRC). • Preparing and obtaining approval of system and programming documentation.
• Recommending changes in development, maintenance, and system standards.
• Coordinating system upgrade activity.

Are you passionate about harnessing the power of AI to transform the quality assurance process? Do you thrive on innovation, using AI tools to predict and solve challenges before they arise, and crafting automated solutions that streamline and accelerate testing? If you excel in a dynamic environment where every day brings a new challenge and the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology, your search ends here.

Join us at IgniteTech, where we're not just following the trends in enterprise software—we're setting them. Our commitment to an AI-First approach in software development and testing is revolutionizing how software quality is ensured, making our solutions faster, smarter, and more reliable.

In this role, you will be at the forefront of our engineering efforts, applying your expertise in AI to elevate our testing processes and contribute to delivering superior software products. You'll be part of a team that values curiosity, learning, and a relentless pursuit of excellence, challenging you to leverage your skills across a diverse array of products.

Embrace this chance to be part of a movement where your work directly impacts the customer experience and drives the future of enterprise software. If you're driven by innovation and the desire to lead in the AI-First era, we want you on our team.

• Embrace the future of quality assurance with AI at the forefront of your daily mission. As an AI-First QA Engineer, your day begins with the innovative task of refining and developing test cases, not just maintaining them but revolutionizing them with AI-driven insights to stay ahead of the curve with each product iteration.
• Your expertise in automating test execution is crucial, transforming repetitive manual QA tasks into efficient, AI-powered processes. This automation not only accelerates release cycles but also embeds precision and consistency into our testing framework, ensuring that our software meets the highest standards of quality and reliability.
• Each day, you will execute a suite of carefully designed test cases, employing AI tools to identify bugs and regression issues with unmatched efficiency. Your critical eye and AI-enhanced analysis skills are key to uncovering the subtlest discrepancies that could impact user experience.
• Documentation is an art you master, where your findings from failed test cases are meticulously recorded, supported by AI-generated evidence such as screenshots and detailed defect reports. • In this role, you are not just a QA Engineer; you are an AI-driven innovator, ensuring that every software solution we offer is not only functional but also a step ahead in quality, thanks to your AI-first approach. Your contribution is pivotal, enabling our organization to deliver software that not only meets but exceeds our customers' expectations, thereby cementing our reputation for excellence in an ever-evolving technological landscape.

Our commitment to advanced tooling and AI-driven automation technologies empowers you to stay at the cutting edge of QA processes. This environment not only accelerates your workflow but also enriches your focus on innovative testing strategies, allowing you to contribute significantly to the evolution of our product quality.
• This contrast highlights our forward-thinking stance on QA engineering, emphasizing our dedication to leveraging AI solutions to streamline testing efforts. It underscores the unique opportunity our AI-First QA Engineer role offers: to be part of a team that's reshaping the future of software quality assurance, where your work directly influences the advancement of our technology and sets new standards within the industry.

AI-First QA Engineer key responsibilities

Leveraging AI-driven methodologies to guarantee that every product within IgniteTech’s portfolio not only meets but surpasses the highest quality standards, thereby facilitating an unparalleled customer experience. • 3+ years of experience in manual testing, with a strong emphasis on leveraging AI tools and methodologies to enhance testing processes.
• A detail-oriented mindset with a commitment to producing high-quality work, underpinned by an innovative approach to integrating AI solutions in quality assurance.
• Proficiency in designing and executing test cases, with a knack for utilizing AI-driven tools to automate these processes effectively.
• A collaborative spirit, capable of working within team environments to foster AI-first testing strategies, ensuring collective success and product excellence.

Nice-to-have Requirements
• A Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field, demonstrating a foundational understanding of the technical principles that underpin AI-driven testing methodologies.
• Experience with TestComplete or similar AI-enhanced automation tools, showcasing an ability to quickly adapt to and leverage new AI technologies for efficient testing automation.
• Prior involvement in AI-first development environments, highlighting a forward-thinking approach to problem-solving and a propensity for innovation within software testing.
• Familiarity with Agile and DevOps practices, enriched by an understanding of how AI can streamline workflows within these methodologies to enhance product development and quality assurance processes.

About IgniteTech

If you want to work hard at a company where you can grow and be a part of a dynamic team, join IgniteTech!

Our long-term vision is to become the largest inclusion bank in LATAM by 2030.

About your role

Your mission will be to ensure the integrity and reliability of our software by meticulously designing, executing, and managing a comprehensive suite of tests including functional, non-functional, unit (UT), API, and user acceptance testing (UAT). Operating within agile frameworks and adhering to international quality standards, you will proactively identify and mitigate defects prior to product release. Your responsibilities extend to analyzing system requirements in close collaboration with the engineer, marketing and product teams, guiding the software development process towards quality-centric outcomes by leveraging industry best practices.

Outcomes
• Participate in continuous improvement of quality processes in the company, which may include implementing new testing tools, improving test documentation, and identifying areas for software quality improvement.
• Analyze and plan tests to ensure product quality; experience with financial technology products is a plus.
• Design and develop test strategies to ensure early testing and defect prevention.
• Provide support to engineer team members and other members of the organization to imbibe the importance of quality assurance processes.

Day to day
• Requirements Verification: Review specifications and technical design documents for clarity and completeness and provide timely, meaningful feedback.
• Test Case Design: Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases.
• Test Execution: Estimate, prioritize, plan, and coordinate test activities.
• Defect Management: Identify, record, document comprehensively, and track bugs.
• Corrections Validation: Perform comprehensive regression testing once bugs have been resolved.
• Process Development: Develop and implement testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs.
• Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate closely with development team members, business analysts, and other stakeholders to ensure a clear understanding of requirements and resolve any ambiguities.
• Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with new tools and testing strategies.

Requirements
• Proven work experience in software development.
• Solid experience in software QA with a strong grasp of QA methodologies, tools, and processes.
• Ability to write clear, concise, and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
• Practical experience with black box testing.
• Experience in database management, specifically with MySQL.
• Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process.
• Continuously improve agile processes and practices, ensuring adaptability to changing team needs.
• Proficiency in English (written and spoken), at a professional business level.

Your skills
• Clear and transparent communication. You are able to able to express your thoughts clearly, concisely and to the point. You can openly discuss any blockers you have, and constructively point out areas for improvement.

Instead of getting stuck thinking "well, this doesn't work", you look for creative / innovative / outside-of-the-box solutions to fix the issue and move on.

You operate with a constant sense of urgency (as if there was a large, hungry wolf chasing you), constantly looking for ways to move ahead and push everything around you to get to your desired outcome in the most efficient and productive way. You don’t wait around and make things happen.
• Flexibility / adaptability / resilience. You can maintain your composure and focus despite the constantly changing environment, and adequately adapt to new conditions. You can swiftly change the course of action when needed, and you don't get easily demotivated.

• Helping others succeed / strong stakeholder focus. While tackling the responsibilities on your plate, you are constantly thinking "How will this impact the other party? job_description:
Detalles del cliente

Innovative American medical device company targeted to people with diabetes and other conditions

Descripción de la vacante

Responsibilities :
• Work with product and software teams to define, develop and execute test plans, increase automation where applicable, and prioritize, plan, and execute testing cycles based on sprint and / or delivery model time frames.
• Lead QA efforts and deliverables and tasks as they relate to creative, functional, and salesforce, desktop / mobile frontend and backend deployments.
• Document detailed test scenarios and scripts derived from defined business requirements and support the QA organization to coordinate test plans across multiple stakeholders / vendors.
• Execute formal test plans with attention to detail ensuring all system components function per defined requirements and are production ready prior to launch
• Identify and assist in implementing the appropriate automation framework solution for web and mobile apps.
• Assist in managing vendor relationship of contracted resources both on and offshore as applicable.
• Create quality measurements, reports and tracking metrics to be consumed by the project teams as well as the IT SQA department.
• Provide leadership in identifying and implementing testing standards and practices.

Perfil del candidato

Education and Experience :

Minimum Requirements :
• Bachelor's Degree or equivalent work experience.
• Minimum of 5 years of hands-on Manual and Agile test desciplines
• Hands on experience testing in the Salesforce classic and Lightning ecosystems.
• Demonstrated successful discipline working within an Agile software delivery methodology project team structure.
• Strong process and manual testing expertise.
• Keen business analysis skills with the ability to intricately understand requirements, functional Specs, and systems to facilitate the creation of Test Plans, and Test scripts.

Preferred Skills and Competencies :
• Extremely organized with excellent communication. Solid presentation and facilitations skills.
• Proven experience working with Test Management tools such as JIRA, ALM, Helix, etc Understanding of mobile and front end architecture, and various coding languages such as JAVA, Python, etc.
• Hands on and action oriented self-starter who can drive complex projects with minimal guidance / oversight. Ability and willingness to create all project deliverables as needed.
• Understanding and / or experience working in a medical device / Life Sciences company. Proven ability to work in a fast paced environment with multiple teams, on concurrent projects.
• Exposure to working with global project teams and / or products.

Oferta de empleo
• 54k annual tuition support for master's degrees, diplomas, certifications.
• 15% of food vouchers : 2,600 in vouchers and the rest in payroll minus taxes
• Savings fund 8% with cap of law
• 20 days Christmas bonus
• 40 dollars for remote work
• Access to online courses (Coursera)
• Major family medical expenses insurance
• Life insurance
• Dental and vision insurance
• Vacations of 10 days and 5 additional days off (between Christmas and New Year the office is closed)
• Stock purchase program capped at 10% monthly salary
